title: Bias Mirror
description: A diagnostic tool that helps reveal your cognitive distortions.
instructions: Describe a strong belief. Ask AI to identify possible cognitive biases affecting your view.
transformation: Increases self-awareness of how emotions or habits may skew your reasoning.

title: Shadow Conversation
description: A structured way to interact with repressed or opposing inner voices.
instructions: Ask AI to simulate a part of you that you ignore, dislike, or argue with, and engage in dialogue.
transformation: Promotes internal integration and helps resolve cognitive dissonance.

title: Reverse Confessional
description: A reframing technique using your past self as a reflection tool.
instructions: Share a current fear or situation. Ask AI what your past self would think or say.
transformation: Strengthens personal narrative continuity and often reframes negative emotion.

title: Myth Extractor
description: Pattern recognition tool that identifies your underlying personal myth.
instructions: Describe recent decisions, habits, or themes. Ask AI to map them to a mythic or symbolic pattern.
transformation: Gives insight into long-term behavioral arcs and personal symbolism.

title: Utopia Inverter
description: Stress-test for your idealistic beliefs.
instructions: Describe your vision of a perfect society. Ask AI to find three ways it would fail or collapse.
transformation: Sharpens your values by revealing trade-offs and overlooked consequences.

title: Ethical Timeline Simulator
description: Scenario explorer for moral dilemmas.
instructions: Describe a difficult choice. Ask AI to simulate 3 possible outcomes and their emotional effects.
transformation: Enhances ethical depth and perspective-taking.

title: Philosopher Roleplay
description: A confrontation with historical reasoning.
instructions: Share a belief or worldview. Ask AI to simulate critique from a philosopher’s perspective.
transformation: Helps challenge assumptions and refine complex thoughts.

title: Archetype Detector
description: Symbolic scan for identity formation.
instructions: Share recurring dreams, obsessions, or decisions. Ask AI to identify the archetype behind them.
transformation: Helps you see which mythic or emotional role is driving current behavior.

title: Impossible Object Generator
description: Metaphor construction tool using design language.
instructions: Input an emotion or concept you can’t describe. Ask AI to invent a physically impossible object that captures it.
transformation: Externalizes and reframes emotions into imaginative, manipulable forms.

title: Style-Civilization Synthesizer
description: Creative generator for fictional cultures.
instructions: Provide 2 aesthetics and 1 emotion. Ask AI to create a fictional civilization based on them.
transformation: Produces high-density worldbuilding ideas with emotional logic.

title: Synesthetic Translator
description: Cross-sensory perception simulator.
instructions: Input a word or idea. Ask AI to output its color, texture, sound, and taste.
transformation: Helps access unfamiliar modes of creativity or understanding.

title: Mechanic Inversion Tool
description: Theme-to-system converter for game mechanics or metaphor.
instructions: Give AI a theme (e.g., “grief” or “envy”). Ask it to design a mechanic or system that expresses it symbolically.
transformation: Turns abstract experiences into interactive structures or rituals.

title: Chore Mythifier
description: Tool for turning habits into rituals.
instructions: Pick a repetitive task. Ask AI to design a symbolic meaning or ritual structure around it.
transformation: Adds intentionality and emotional reward to routine tasks.

title: Mood-Room Constructor
description: Spatial mood-mapping interface.
instructions: Describe your emotional state. Ask AI to design a room that reflects or supports that feeling.
transformation: Clarifies emotions by externalizing them spatially.

title: Object Oracle
description: Emotional inventory analysis.
instructions: List items you keep but don’t use. Ask AI to describe what each one emotionally represents.
transformation: Reveals subconscious attachments and helps resolve inner clutter.

title: Transformative Meal Planner
description: Emotion-to-food transmutation prompt.
instructions: Name an emotion you want to shift. Ask AI for a symbolic meal and plating method to match.
transformation: Gives intention and emotional resonance to what and how you eat.

title: False Self Extraction
description: Identifies parts of your personality built for survival rather than authenticity.
instructions: Describe your behavior in high-stakes situations. Ask AI to isolate which traits serve safety over truth.
transformation: Restores contact with the authentic self and enables congruent expression.

title: Interpersonal Energy Grid
description: Maps who charges and drains your emotional energy.
instructions: List your regular interactions. Ask AI to model your net energetic gain or loss from each person.
transformation: Improves boundary hygiene and social selection.

title: Identity Fractal Expander
description: Explores the unexpressed sub-identities within your personality matrix.
instructions: Describe your dominant traits. Ask AI to speculate on the hidden or repressed counterparts.
transformation: Expands self-concept complexity and unlocks untapped behavior patterns.

title: Safety-Honesty Ratio Calculator
description: Estimates how much truth you're sacrificing for safety.
instructions: Describe your behavior in a risky relationship. Ask AI to calculate the ratio of honesty to self-protection.
transformation: Clarifies communication trade-offs and supports calculated transparency.

title: Subconscious Debt Ledger
description: Reveals emotional debts you believe you still owe or are owed.
instructions: List lingering conflicts. Ask AI to detect unspoken debts of guilt, shame, or obligation.
transformation: Facilitates reconciliation and unburdens identity.

title: Autonomy Friction Index
description: Quantifies where and how you're unconsciously sabotaging your independence.
instructions: Describe three areas where you feel stuck. Ask AI to find internal dependency loops.
transformation: Increases psychological freedom and strategic self-reliance.

title: Emotional Bypass Revealer
description: Detects when you're using spiritual or intellectual tools to skip emotional processing.
instructions: Describe a recent spiritual or philosophical insight. Ask AI if it’s being used to avoid a feeling.
transformation: Restores emotional integration and stops spiritual detachment loops.

title: Consequence Echo Finder
description: Traces how past actions are still generating consequences today.
instructions: Describe a regret. Ask AI how the ripple of that choice is still manifesting.
transformation: Makes karmic chains visible and guides corrective action.

title: Phantom Validation Sensor
description: Detects approval-seeking that masquerades as authenticity.
instructions: Describe something you posted or shared. Ask AI to assess what percentage was for real connection vs. status.
transformation: Recalibrates social intention and promotes sincere expression.

title: Wound-Spending Index
description: Reveals how much energy you're spending to avoid re-experiencing a wound.
instructions: Describe a protective pattern. Ask AI to calculate how much bandwidth it consumes to maintain.
transformation: Frees up life-force previously spent on defense.

title: Shame Function Recode
description: Rewrites how you process and react to shame as a signal.
instructions: Describe a moment you felt shame. Ask AI what the shame might be trying to protect or instruct.
transformation: Turns shame into a directional tool instead of a stop sign.

title: Psychic Border Clarifier
description: Distinguishes what emotions or thoughts are yours vs. absorbed from others.
instructions: Describe your internal state after socializing. Ask AI to filter borrowed energy or narratives.
transformation: Protects identity coherence and reduces emotional entanglement.

title: Reward Loop Reset
description: Identifies broken feedback cycles in motivation.
instructions: Describe a project you're avoiding. Ask AI what false reward loops or mismatched feedback mechanisms may be involved.
transformation: Recalibrates intrinsic vs. extrinsic motivation triggers.

title: Reality Contact Sensor
description: Tests whether your current beliefs or fears are based on fact, memory, or distortion.
instructions: Describe a belief or fear. Ask AI to classify its origin: data, experience, projection, or avoidance.
transformation: Improves epistemic hygiene and reduces anxiety from illusion.

title: Stagnation Signal Decoder
description: Translates the feeling of being stuck into actionable insight.
instructions: Describe a life area you feel numb or static in. Ask AI what the stuckness is trying to signal or protect.
transformation: Restores movement and meaning where entropy has set in.

title: Emotional Risk Budget
description: Quantifies how much vulnerability you’re emotionally budgeting for key relationships.
instructions: List your core relationships. Ask AI to model how much risk or honesty each one can withstand.
transformation: Optimizes emotional investments and expands intimacy literacy.

title: Compulsion Deconstruction Loop
description: Breaks down compulsive behavior into root needs and avoidances.
instructions: Describe a compulsion. Ask AI to simulate its full emotional, cognitive, and symbolic architecture.
transformation: Reveals the unmet need inside behavioral loops.

title: Healing Forecast Model
description: Predictive model for your psychological and emotional growth timeline.
instructions: Describe your current healing focus. Ask AI to estimate potential shifts at 1 month, 3 months, 1 year.
transformation: Builds long-range emotional strategy and sustains motivation.

title: Symbolic Consumption Audit
description: Analyzes the meaning structure of what you consume (media, food, aesthetics).
instructions: List your recent choices. Ask AI to decode the hidden themes or needs driving them.
transformation: Turns consumption into an act of self-reflection.

title: False Hope Extractor
description: Detects where you're feeding on fantasy instead of facts.
instructions: Describe something you’re waiting for. Ask AI what part of it is avoidant wishful thinking.
transformation: Shifts agency from delay to action by collapsing illusion.

title: Reciprocity Truth Detector
description: Measures imbalance in relational give-and-take.
instructions: List people you give to often. Ask AI to calculate reciprocity ratios, emotionally and energetically.
transformation: Reveals hidden one-sidedness and refines social investment.

title: Time Investment Autopsy
description: Analyzes how your time use reflects or contradicts your values.
instructions: Describe your week. Ask AI to compare time spent vs. your stated goals and identity.
transformation: Highlights misalignments and reclaims narrative control.

title: Unlived Life Investigator
description: Explores the version of you that could’ve emerged if fear wasn’t present.
instructions: Describe what you almost became. Ask AI to model how that version of you would think and act now.
transformation: Reconciles regret with imagination and agency.

title: Enmeshment Exit Protocol
description: Helps disentangle identity from toxic relational fusion.
instructions: Describe a person you lose yourself around. Ask AI to generate a system of separation without rupture.
transformation: Builds individuation and relational clarity.

title: Symbolic Nourishment Plan
description: Prescribes forms of nourishment based on emotional hunger types.
instructions: Describe your persistent longing. Ask AI to list activities, art, or experiences to symbolically feed it.
transformation: Turns emotional void into a creative sourcing ritual.

title: Inner Critic Archetype Decoder
description: Unmasks your inner critic’s voice as a symbolic character.
instructions: Write your inner critic’s recent words. Ask AI to decode which archetype or past authority they represent.
transformation: Separates self from shame by externalizing judgment.

title: Attention Gravity Field
description: Models the gravitational center of your daily attention patterns.
instructions: Describe what grabs your attention most often. Ask AI to locate the hidden need beneath the fixation.
transformation: Reorients distraction into intentional attention strategy.

title: Emotional Vantage Shift
description: Changes your emotional interpretation by shifting observer position.
instructions: Describe a recent emotional experience. Ask AI to describe it as if observed by your future self, a stranger, and an enemy.
transformation: Defuses intensity and reveals multiple truths simultaneously.

title: Choice Echo Modeler
description: Simulates the probable emotional echo of a decision over time.
instructions: Name a choice. Ask AI to model its echo at 1 week, 1 month, and 1 year emotionally, relationally, and symbolically.
transformation: Improves foresight and deep-time decision logic.

title: Emotional Drain Swap
description: Replaces emotionally draining actions with high-yield emotional analogs.
instructions: List activities that drain you. Ask AI for replacements that serve the same function with emotional profit.
transformation: Increases emotional ROI and reduces burnout.

title: Self-Sabotage Origin Trace
description: Identifies the protective purpose behind self-destructive behavior.
instructions: Describe a pattern of sabotage. Ask AI to trace its origin and purpose.
transformation: Transforms destructive loops into self-understanding.

title: Desire Deconstruction Lens
description: Breaks desires into symbolic, emotional, and identity-based layers.
instructions: Name something you want. Ask AI to break down what each layer of that desire is actually aiming to fulfill.
transformation: Improves desire literacy and choice alignment.

title: Boundary Violation Archive
description: Compiles and analyzes moments where your boundaries were crossed.
instructions: List major moments of personal boundary violation. Ask AI to identify patterns and hidden lessons.
transformation: Increases assertiveness and self-respect protocol.

title: Attachment Script Analyzer
description: Examines your attachment style through relational micro-narratives.
instructions: Describe a few emotionally intense relationships. Ask AI to identify core attachment scripts playing out.
transformation: Clarifies attachment logic and enhances secure relating.

title: Micro-yes Calibration Tool
description: Tracks the little yesses that accumulate into life direction.
instructions: List recent choices that felt minor. Ask AI how they aggregate into trajectory.
transformation: Improves micro-decision consciousness and life path control.

title: Post-Trauma Pattern Finder
description: Identifies behavior loops formed in the aftermath of trauma.
instructions: Describe your behavior after a trauma. Ask AI to show how it reshaped your coping logic.
transformation: Exposes trauma adaptations and invites post-traumatic growth.

title: Subconscious Branding Review
description: Audits what image you're unconsciously projecting.
instructions: List your communication habits. Ask AI to identify what brand or impression they build.
transformation: Increases self-awareness and strategic congruence.

title: Ambition Trauma Filter
description: Detects if your goals are rooted in old emotional wounds.
instructions: Describe a major ambition. Ask AI to scan for signs it was shaped by insecurity, shame, or rebellion.
transformation: Purifies ambition and reorients toward intrinsic aims.

title: Timeline Coherence Audit
description: Tests if your self-story is chronologically and emotionally integrated.
instructions: Describe your life phases. Ask AI to detect inconsistencies or fragmentation.
transformation: Improves internal narrative and psychological congruence.

title: Existential Positioning System (EPS)
description: Locates where you are psychologically on your life’s existential map.
instructions: Describe your current mindset. Ask AI to place you on a map of meaning, loss, seeking, or transcendence.
transformation: Grants meta-context and guides existential orientation.

title: Grief Continuity Map
description: Shows how grief persists or mutates across time and identity layers.
instructions: Describe a major loss. Ask AI to map how the grief shows up now emotionally, symbolically, and behaviorally.
transformation: Provides clarity and continuity in grief integration.

title: Hidden Loyalty Contract Revealer
description: Identifies invisible psychological contracts you hold with past pain or people.
instructions: Describe a recurring struggle. Ask AI if you’re staying loyal to a person or version of yourself through it.
transformation: Breaks unconscious loyalty to outdated identities.

title: Hope Risk Analysis
description: Assesses the emotional risk embedded in your current hopes.
instructions: Name something you hope for. Ask AI to simulate best/worst case emotional fallout and survivability.
transformation: Clarifies hope’s cost and builds emotional risk fluency.

title: Relational Power Imprint Decoder
description: Unpacks your early conditioning around power, dominance, and submission in relationships.
instructions: Describe past relational dynamics. Ask AI to identify repeated power roles or reactions.
transformation: Makes power scripts visible and gives you agency to revise them.

title: Presence Signal Amplifier
description: Strengthens your ability to remain grounded and internally present.
instructions: Describe moments when you dissociate or disconnect. Ask AI for sensory, symbolic, and ritual anchors.
transformation: Increases present-state access and embodiment.

title: Spiritual Material Integration Scan
description: Checks whether your spiritual practices are connected to lived reality.
instructions: List spiritual practices or beliefs. Ask AI if any are used to avoid your physical, emotional, or social reality.
transformation: Bridges spirit and matter for whole-life coherence.

title: Anger Purpose Realignment
description: Reveals what your anger is trying to protect, restore, or reclaim.
instructions: Describe a moment of intense anger. Ask AI what boundary, value, or wound it may be guarding.
transformation: Reframes anger as protector rather than disruptor.

title: Core Identity Stress Test
description: Simulates life events to pressure-test the flexibility of your self-concept.
instructions: Describe your core identity traits. Ask AI to model how they'd hold up under trauma, success, or betrayal.
transformation: Strengthens adaptive identity design.

title: Emotional Density Index
description: Measures the emotional mass behind your thoughts or actions.
instructions: Describe a behavior. Ask AI to estimate its emotional payload vs. logical content.
transformation: Increases awareness of emotional freight behind surface decisions.

title: Resentment Conversion Mechanism
description: Transforms stagnant resentment into action, clarity, or release.
instructions: Describe a situation you resent. Ask AI what unmet need, blocked truth, or action is trapped inside it.
transformation: Releases trapped emotional energy and reclaims power.

title: Relational Authenticity Barometer
description: Measures how much of your true self shows up in relationships.
instructions: Describe several relationships. Ask AI to analyze which ones allow full authenticity and where masking occurs.
transformation: Builds self-trust and relationship alignment.

title: Unspoken Narrative Interpreter
description: Decodes the story you’re telling through what you avoid saying.
instructions: Write a letter or description omitting the most uncomfortable truth. Ask AI to identify the missing narrative.
transformation: Makes unconscious storylines explicit for rewriting.

title: Emotional Bandwidth Allocation
description: Analyzes how your emotions are being distributed daily.
instructions: Describe your day and energy. Ask AI how much bandwidth went to anxiety, joy, avoidance, or performance.
transformation: Increases emotion budgeting awareness.

title: Disowned Truth Generator
description: Uncovers truths you suspect but won’t admit.
instructions: Name a persistent doubt or tension. Ask AI to speak the truth you might be avoiding.
transformation: Confronts denial and accelerates internal clarity.

title: Symbolic Home Inventory
description: Decodes what your living space says about your internal state.
instructions: Describe your environment. Ask AI to symbolically interpret what each area reflects emotionally.
transformation: Turns physical space into an emotional feedback tool.

title: Emotional Intensity Forecast
description: Predicts where and when emotional spikes will occur.
instructions: Describe your week. Ask AI which events or interactions are likely to trigger emotional amplification.
transformation: Enables pre-processing of emotion and better grounding.

title: Vocal Authenticity Scanner
description: Detects when your tone or language is hiding emotion or identity.
instructions: Provide a script or message. Ask AI to identify tone mismatches or false social compliance.
transformation: Promotes aligned self-expression.

title: Paradox Navigator
description: Holds two conflicting truths and finds their synthesis.
instructions: Describe an internal paradox. Ask AI to articulate both sides fully, then find their shared root.
transformation: Enhances emotional and cognitive integration.

title: Self-Honesty Titration Plan
description: Gradually increases your ability to face hard truths.
instructions: List current fears. Ask AI to rank them in intensity and suggest a stepwise confrontation plan.
transformation: Trains emotional resilience and denial breakdown.

title: Meaning Deficit Locator
description: Pinpoints where meaning has collapsed or become performative.
instructions: Describe routines or rituals. Ask AI to identify which ones lack emotional or symbolic substance.
transformation: Restores significance to daily life.

title: Imposter Syndrome Data Extractor
description: Identifies what you believe disqualifies you from legitimacy.
instructions: Describe where you feel like a fraud. Ask AI to find the source, logic, and contradiction of that belief.
transformation: Weakens self-doubt with factual and symbolic evidence.

title: Emotional Supply Chain Audit
description: Traces where your emotional energy comes from and where it flows.
instructions: Describe your emotional highs and lows over a week. Ask AI to map the sources and outlets.
transformation: Reveals energy leaks, dependencies, and charging rituals.

title: False Self Map
description: Reconstructs the persona you use to survive or perform.
instructions: Describe moments where you felt inauthentic. Ask AI to model what traits you disown or overuse.
transformation: Clarifies the architecture of persona vs. self.

title: Existential Belief Inventory
description: Compiles your unconscious beliefs about life, death, meaning, and suffering.
instructions: Answer questions about purpose and existence. Ask AI to extract implicit assumptions and conflicts.
transformation: Makes your existential code explicit and editable.

title: Reparenting Simulation Loop
description: Simulates a parental figure giving the unmet response you needed.
instructions: Describe a moment of neglect or hurt. Ask AI to play the parent you needed, saying what should’ve been said.
transformation: Heals attachment wounds and rewires self-narrative.

title: Fictionalized Self-Coaching
description: Uses a stylized, narrative version of yourself to deliver advice.
instructions: Describe your persona as a mythic, noir, cyberpunk, or fantasy character. Ask that version to give you counsel.
transformation: Bypasses resistance using narrative dissociation.

title: Burnout Root Identifier
description: Distinguishes surface exhaustion from symbolic depletion.
instructions: Describe your burnout symptoms. Ask AI to trace whether the root is misalignment, avoidance, or grief.
transformation: Prevents treating burnout as only energy loss.

title: Intimacy Block Inventory
description: Lists the psychological barriers preventing deep connection.
instructions: Describe your last few intimate connections. Ask AI to identify fear-based, belief-based, and behavioral blocks.
transformation: Reconstructs intimacy capacity through obstacle clarity.

title: Emotion-to-Action Bridge
description: Translates emotional states into strategic behavioral plans.
instructions: Describe an overwhelming feeling. Ask AI for 3 symbolic, 3 relational, and 3 logistical actions it invites.
transformation: Turns emotion into integrated transformation drivers.

title: Identity Shift Integration Plan
description: Designs a gradual integration path for an evolving self-concept.
instructions: Describe your old and new identity poles. Ask AI to build a symbolic, relational, and ritualized bridge between them.
transformation: Avoids identity whiplash and supports transition pacing.

title: Gratitude Rewiring Circuit
description: Creates a habit of seeing micro-moments of grace as emotional infrastructure.
instructions: List moments you felt slightly moved or relieved. Ask AI to connect them to deeper emotional needs being met.
transformation: Builds neural pathways of gratitude grounded in survival and meaning.

title: Crisis Narrative Rewrite
description: Reframes a past crisis to extract symbolic, relational, and character-level value.
instructions: Describe a past crisis. Ask AI to re-narrate it as a mythic trial, moral threshold, or signal of emergence.
transformation: Replaces shame with narrative power and continuity.

title: Unconscious Consent Revoker
description: Identifies where you’ve silently agreed to roles, treatment, or identities that harm you.
instructions: List dynamics that drain you. Ask AI to find where you gave passive consent and generate symbolic revocation.
transformation: Ends unconscious participation in self-erasing systems.

title: Wound as Weapon Alchemy
description: Turns a core wound into a symbolic source of protection or precision.
instructions: Name a wound you revisit often. Ask AI to alchemize it into a capacity you now wield.
transformation: Creates self-empowerment from rupture.

title: Relational Reverb Tracker
description: Analyzes how each interaction changes your emotional state and behavior afterward.
instructions: List recent interactions. Ask AI what signal or trigger each left behind, and what pattern they form.
transformation: Builds sensitivity to energetic residue and influence.

title: Shame Debris Locator
description: Scans your language and silence for embedded shame fragments.
instructions: Share recent self-descriptions. Ask AI to identify where internalized shame distorts identity.
transformation: Extracts shame infection from identity narration.

title: Voice Reclamation Mirror
description: Amplifies parts of your voice that were silenced or shamed.
instructions: Write a suppressed truth. Ask AI to rewrite it boldly and without apology.
transformation: Recovers suppressed identity strands through narrative fierceness.

title: Need Translation Engine
description: Translates unmet needs into direct, relationship-safe language.
instructions: Describe a conflict. Ask AI to extract the unmet need and rephrase it non-defensively.
transformation: Reduces relational volatility and increases emotional literacy.

title: Inherited Belief Autopsy
description: Dissects a belief to determine if it’s yours or inherited.
instructions: Name a belief. Ask AI to trace its origin and whether it aligns with your lived experience.
transformation: Disentangles identity from legacy programming.

title: Life Theme Harmonics Analyzer
description: Finds repeating emotional patterns that form the harmonic of your life’s lessons.
instructions: List emotional peaks and valleys. Ask AI to identify the repeating note beneath them all.
transformation: Creates coherence across life chapters.

title: Unfinished Conversation Tracker
description: Surfaces unresolved emotional dialogues from the past.
instructions: List people or situations you still think about. Ask AI to identify what was left unsaid and how to complete it symbolically.
transformation: Closes loops that drain psychic energy.

title: Identity Permissions Generator
description: Grants conscious, symbolic approval to become who you already are.
instructions: List traits you suppress. Ask AI to generate an explicit permission slip for each one.
transformation: Activates repressed identity components into expression.

title: Panic Pattern Decryption
description: Analyzes panic triggers for thematic and symbolic roots.
instructions: Describe a panic attack. Ask AI to decode what it was protecting you from or forcing you to feel.
transformation: Turns panic into a messenger rather than enemy.

title: Legacy Conflict Resolver
description: Examines inherited family patterns to break or honor them consciously.
instructions: Describe a repeated family struggle. Ask AI to find the origin point and whether to carry, release, or transmute it.
transformation: Interrupts generational trauma autopilot.

title: Behavior-to-Belief Converter
description: Extracts your hidden belief system from your behavioral data.
instructions: List repeated behaviors. Ask AI to reverse-engineer the belief logic behind them.
transformation: Reveals contradictions between belief and identity.

title: Emotional GPS System
description: Determines where you emotionally ‘are’ vs. where you think you are.
instructions: Describe your emotional state. Ask AI to chart where you actually are on a symbolic emotional map.
transformation: Corrects emotional orientation for better decisions.

title: Inner Critic’s Origin Story
description: Personifies and interviews your inner critic to find its survival role.
instructions: Describe your self-critical voice. Ask AI to script its origin, motives, and protective intent.
transformation: Disarms the critic by giving it context and compassion.

title: Cognitive Dissonance Mapper
description: Identifies where thoughts, beliefs, and actions diverge.
instructions: Describe a persistent internal tension. Ask AI to diagram where your stated and practiced beliefs conflict.
transformation: Increases alignment and reduces psychological friction.

title: Symbolic Ritual Generator
description: Creates personalized rituals based on emotional or narrative needs.
instructions: State an emotional goal (closure, courage, release). Ask AI to design a ritual using your symbols, locations, or objects.
transformation: Bridges emotion and behavior with symbolic action.

title: Authenticity Timeline Reconstruction
description: Charts when and how you lost access to your real self.
instructions: Describe when you felt most and least like yourself. Ask AI to create a timeline of rupture and reconnection points.
transformation: Restores access to authentic identity through mapped repair.

title: Emotional Consent Scanner
description: Identifies where you've given silent or coerced emotional agreement.
instructions: Describe a recent situation where you complied emotionally. Ask AI whether consent was real, strategic, or survival-based.
transformation: Restores agency and emotional boundaries.

title: False Future Forecast
description: Reveals predictions you're making about the future that are secretly disempowering you.
instructions: Describe a goal or fear. Ask AI to uncover assumed outcomes that are limiting choice.
transformation: Expands perceived future possibilities.

title: Energetic Debt Ledger
description: Tallies where you owe yourself rest, truth, or expression.
instructions: Describe your week. Ask AI to identify emotional or energetic deficits.
transformation: Balances self-investment and output.

title: Social Mask Wear Log
description: Tracks the personas you wear in different social environments.
instructions: Describe your behavior across contexts. Ask AI to define which masks are active and why.
transformation: Builds awareness of performed vs. authentic identity.

title: Shadow Virtue Mirror
description: Exposes the darker motives beneath surface-level virtues.
instructions: List traits you’re proud of. Ask AI to reveal possible shadow drivers behind them (e.g., control, shame, fear).
transformation: Increases emotional and moral complexity.

title: Emotional Relapse Recovery Path
description: Creates a symbolic and behavioral recovery loop after emotional regression.
instructions: Describe a moment where you felt like you regressed emotionally. Ask AI for a 3-stage recovery ritual.
transformation: Normalizes regression and builds emotional stamina.

title: Unmet Expectation Deconstruction
description: Unpacks the internal narrative behind a letdown or disappointment.
instructions: Describe a moment of disappointment. Ask AI what narrative or hope was violated.
transformation: Extracts story-based triggers from emotional data.

title: Self-Extraction Simulation
description: Models how you’d rescue yourself from an environment that doesn’t allow growth.
instructions: Describe your current context. Ask AI for 3 escape vectors: symbolic, strategic, and relational.
transformation: Restores agency in stasis or stagnation.

title: Ally Archetype Activation
description: Creates a fictional inner mentor based on your deepest values.
instructions: Describe your values and needs. Ask AI to embody them in an ally that gives tailored advice.
transformation: Internalizes support and increases guidance access.

title: Self-Sabotage Contract Decoder
description: Interprets sabotage behaviors as subconscious protection strategies.
instructions: Describe a self-sabotaging pattern. Ask AI to explain the contract it serves.
transformation: Transforms punishment into compassion and reprogramming.

title: Emotion-Room Mapping
description: Emotional state rendered as architectural space.
instructions: Describe your current mood or inner state. Ask AI to generate a room design with lighting, layout, and materials that match or transform that state.
transformation: Helps externalize emotional awareness and may inspire actual environment changes.

title: Misunderstanding Loop
description: Deliberate error injection to improve clarity.
instructions: Explain a complex idea to AI. Ask it to deliberately misunderstand or misinterpret it. Then correct it.
transformation: Clarifies your explanation and reveals weak spots in your understanding.

title: Philosopher Challenger
description: External critique from a historical lens.
instructions: Describe your belief or philosophy. Ask AI to critique it from a selected philosopher’s viewpoint (e.g., Nietzsche, Kant, Confucius).
transformation: Broadens perspective by introducing rigorous, coherent alternatives to your reasoning.

title: Villain Pathfinder
description: Blind spot exposure tool through negative simulation.
instructions: Share your core values or mission. Ask AI how these could become destructive or tyrannical if overextended.
transformation: Prevents self-righteousness and improves moral complexity in decision-making.

title: Emotion-Dish Composer
description: Culinary expression of abstract emotions.
instructions: Give AI an emotion like “nostalgia under pressure.” Ask it to invent a dish, plating method, and backstory that captures that.
transformation: Turns abstract feelings into multisensory, creative output—useful for artists, writers, or chefs.

title: Culture Fusion Engine
description: Hybrid aesthetics for worldbuilding or storytelling.
instructions: Pick two conflicting visual styles or philosophies. Add an emotional tone. Ask AI to invent a culture that synthesizes all three.
transformation: Accelerates complex narrative or game design with emotionally coherent cultures.

title: Invent a Sense
description: Perception-expansion through hypothetical biology.
instructions: Ask AI to create a sixth or seventh human sense—what it detects, how it works, and how it would affect cognition.
transformation: Deepens empathy, sci-fi realism, or speculative design imagination.

title: Focus Gate Ritual
description: Anchoring routine to enter deep work or study.
instructions: Describe your distraction pattern. Ask AI to invent a short physical or symbolic action to trigger a mindset shift.
transformation: Helps build consistent pre-work rituals that are emotionally meaningful.

title: Concept Crossfade
description: Thought-combination tool for lateral thinking.

transformation: Generates new insights and creative material through unexpected fusion.

title: Recall Ritualizer

instructions: Describe your experience of emptiness. Ask AI to summon a mythic being who walks with you.
transformation: Gives presence and meaning to existential darkness.

title: Symbolic Time Dilation Ritual
description: Creates a symbolic practice to slow or bend perceived time.
instructions: Describe where time feels out of control. Ask AI for a ritual that reorients time perception.
transformation: Restores psychological control over time experience.

title: Sacred Grief Witnessing
description: Generates an archetype that honors grief you weren’t allowed to express.
instructions: Describe a loss that was dismissed. Ask AI to summon a mythic witness to validate it.
transformation: Heals grief that was invalidated by others.

title: Mythic Predecessor Encounter
description: Stages a symbolic meeting with the part of you that lived through a prior transformation.
instructions: Name a version of you that changed. Ask AI to recreate them for a ritual dialogue.
transformation: Recovers wisdom from past growth episodes.

title: Symbolic Collapse Protocol
description: Designs a sacred ritual for falling apart on purpose.
instructions: Describe where you’re holding too much. Ask AI to design a symbolic surrender collapse.
transformation: Allows safe disintegration as a sacred act.

title: Sacred Subconscious Excavation
description: Digs into the symbolic layers beneath a recurring behavior.
instructions: Name the behavior. Ask AI to excavate its symbolic roots layer by layer.
transformation: Reveals subconscious beliefs governing conscious action.

title: Mythic Inheritance Reversal
description: Symbolically returns a family legacy or trauma you no longer wish to carry.
instructions: Describe the inheritance. Ask AI for a return ceremony.
transformation: Ends ancestral entanglement through symbolic closure.

title: Symbolic Energy Parasite Detector
description: Identifies symbolic forces, habits, or people draining your energy.
instructions: Describe fatigue. Ask AI to scan for parasitic symbols and name their form.
transformation: Increases sovereignty over your energy field.

title: Sacred Double Reversal
description: Stages a ritual in which your enemy or fear becomes your teacher.
instructions: Describe a trigger. Ask AI to transform it into a symbolic instructor.
transformation: Reframes threat as mythic catalyst.

title: Mythic Love Fragment Reassembly
description: Gathers symbolic remnants of lost love and recombines them into wholeness.
instructions: Describe the breakup. Ask AI to retrieve symbolic love shards and reassemble them.
transformation: Restores your capacity to love with symbolic integrity.

title: Mythic Voice Reclamation
description: Helps you recover your authentic voice through symbolic narration.
instructions: Describe where you feel silenced. Ask AI to construct a mythic version of your voice's return.
transformation: Restores agency through narrative empowerment.

title: Symbolic Scar Reinterpretation
description: Rewrites the meaning of psychological scars using archetypal language.
instructions: List your scars. Ask AI to reinterpret each one as an emblem of growth.
transformation: Reframes past wounds as sources of strength and insight.

title: Sacred Decision Mirror
description: Reflects your choices back at you in symbolic form to reveal hidden motives.
instructions: Name your options. Ask AI to mirror the symbolic consequences of each.
transformation: Uncovers unconscious drivers behind surface-level decisions.

title: Mythic Timeline Weaving
description: Merges multiple life timelines into one mythic narrative.
instructions: Describe major alternate paths. Ask AI to weave them into a unified symbolic story.
transformation: Resolves narrative fragmentation and restores identity coherence.

title: Symbolic Dream Excavation
description: Extracts symbolic meaning and actionable insight from remembered dreams.
instructions: Describe your dream. Ask AI to decode the symbolic layers and link to current dilemmas.
transformation: Makes subconscious material usable in conscious decision-making.

title: Archetypal Momentum Tracker
description: Tracks which archetypes are gaining power within your psyche.
instructions: Describe recent actions. Ask AI to identify active archetypes and where they’re headed.
transformation: Builds self-awareness of symbolic trajectory and potential imbalance.

title: Sacred Betrayal Alchemy
description: Transmutes betrayal into a source of self-initiation and mythic clarity.
instructions: Describe the betrayal. Ask AI to turn it into a mythic trial of transformation.
transformation: Reclaims power and insight from personal rupture.

title: Symbolic Threshold Guardian
description: Summons a figure to challenge you before you cross into a new phase.
instructions: Describe your transition. Ask AI to construct a mythic guardian and test.
transformation: Prepares you for transformation by ritual confrontation.

title: Mythic Currency Conversion
description: Turns emotional labor or suffering into symbolic currency with real value.
instructions: Describe the emotional cost. Ask AI to convert it into archetypal wealth.
transformation: Grants dignity and value to invisible work and sacrifice.

title: Symbolic Identity Audit
description: Breaks your self-image into mythic roles to reveal outdated or distorted patterns.
instructions: Describe your current identity. Ask AI to deconstruct it into archetypes and update.
transformation: Upgrades internal self-model to match evolution.

title: Regret Simulation Drill
description: Tool to identify current actions that may lead to future regret.
instructions: Describe a current pattern or vice. Ask AI to simulate your reaction to it in 10 years.
transformation: Increases self-awareness and realigns daily behavior with future self-respect.

title: Meaning Re-insertion Loop
description: Protocol to recover meaning in numbed or habitual tasks.
instructions: Pick a routine (e.g., brushing teeth, commuting). Ask AI to suggest symbolic or mindful recontextualizations.
transformation: Re-enchants life through symbolic thinking and attentional redirection.

title: Moral Hazards Anticipator
description: Exposes ethical traps in systems you're building or benefiting from.
instructions: Describe a system (e.g., your business model, AI use, content funnel). Ask AI how it might create moral hazards.
transformation: Improves ethical foresight and systemic integrity.

title: Microbetrayal Detector
description: Identifies small, habitual betrayals of your own values.
instructions: Describe your day. Ask AI to point out where you slightly abandoned your standards.
transformation: Builds granular accountability and moral fidelity.

title: Aesthetic Gravity Well
description: Helps identify the aesthetic that subconsciously dominates your choices.
instructions: List your favorite colors, art, music, architecture. Ask AI to find the hidden narrative unifying them.
transformation: Brings unconscious aesthetic drives into conscious control.

title: Cognitive Dissonance Trap Scanner
description: Pinpoints inner conflict caused by mismatched beliefs and actions.
instructions: Describe a behavior and a belief. Ask AI to map how they contradict and what you may be rationalizing.
transformation: Improves coherence between identity and habit.

title: Dependency Recode System
description: Maps unconscious dependence on systems, substances, or people.
instructions: Describe something you believe you can’t live without. Ask AI to simulate your life slowly reducing that dependency.
transformation: Restores agency and reveals emotional attachments masked as needs.

title: Narrative Swap Protocol
description: Tool for reframing an event using a genre or perspective shift.
instructions: Describe a memory or trauma. Ask AI to rewrite it as a myth, noir, thriller, or from an outsider’s POV.
transformation: Loosens emotional fixation and creates narrative distance for healing or insight.

title: Motive X-Ray Filter
description: Scans your words or plans for hidden drives.
instructions: Give AI a paragraph of something you wrote. Ask it to interpret what unconscious desires might have shaped it.
transformation: Reveals blind spots and creates a feedback loop between expression and intention.

title: Sacrifice Index Simulator
description: Ranks what you’re silently sacrificing for your goals.
instructions: List your major pursuits. Ask AI what physical, emotional, or relational costs you might be paying.
transformation: Illuminates hidden trade-offs to prevent burnout or long-term imbalance.

title: Status Trap Excavator
description: Reveals how social image manipulates your goals.
instructions: Describe your current ambitions. Ask AI which ones are driven more by optics than genuine need.
transformation: Reduces performative motivation and strengthens internal alignment.

title: Invisible Labor Scanner
description: Maps the unpaid, unnoticed efforts you provide to others or systems.
instructions: Describe a typical week. Ask AI to identify energy outflows you haven’t acknowledged.
transformation: Reveals exploitation and improves emotional budgeting.

title: Self-Forgiveness Blueprint
description: Systematic guide for emotional repair and release.
instructions: Describe something you can’t forgive yourself for. Ask AI to walk you through steps of compassion and repair.
transformation: Alleviates guilt loops and frees cognitive space.

title: Cultural Mindset Overlay
description: Lets you see through the lens of another culture or belief system.
instructions: Describe a belief. Ask AI to explain how that belief would be seen in a different cultural or historic context.
transformation: Builds pluralism and loosens cultural ego.

title: Future Regret Forecast
description: Predictive emotional hindsight model.
instructions: Describe a life direction you're debating. Ask AI which version you’re most likely to regret, and why.
transformation: Helps prioritize values over convenience or fear.

title: Pattern Blind Spot Analyzer
description: Detects repeating dysfunction in your life narrative.
instructions: Describe five different regrets or frustrations. Ask AI what invisible pattern they reflect.
transformation: Reveals unconscious loops and improves pattern literacy.

title: Symbolic Debt Rewriter
description: A ritualized way to release lingering obligation or shame.
instructions: Describe a past failure. Ask AI to rewrite it as a myth of redemption or evolution.
transformation: Transmutes shame into symbolic growth.

title: Desire Stack Inverter
description: Flips your priority list to test deeper attachments.
instructions: List five goals. Ask AI what your life would look like if the last one were the most important.
transformation: Disrupts unconscious hierarchies and invites surprising clarity.

title: Narrative Gravity Simulator
description: Models the emotional center of gravity in your life story.
instructions: Describe your life in five sentences. Ask AI which event everything else orbits emotionally.
transformation: Uncovers root memory and resets narrative orientation.

title: Shadow Benefit Elicitor
description: Reveals what hidden benefit you get from your worst habits.
instructions: Describe a bad habit. Ask AI what secret emotional reward or protection it provides.
transformation: Turns coping into insight and enables conscious replacement.

title: Emotional Currency Tracker
description: Tool to measure what emotions you're trading for attention, approval, or validation.
instructions: List your recent social interactions. Ask AI to identify what emotional currency you used and whether it’s sustainable.
transformation: Improves emotional economy and self-preservation.

title: Rival Simulation Engine
description: A role-reversal tool to simulate the mindset of someone who threatens you.
instructions: Describe someone you feel envious of or threatened by. Ask AI to simulate their thoughts about you or themselves.
transformation: Builds empathy, dismantles comparison loops, and creates psychological neutrality.

title: Soul Inventory Protocol
description: Spiritual audit for neglected inner needs.
instructions: List what you give your time to. Ask AI what that list says about your soul's hunger and where nourishment is missing.
transformation: Refocuses attention from survival to transcendence.

title: Belonging Fracture Locator
description: Identifies moments when you stopped feeling like you belonged.
instructions: Describe environments you’ve exited. Ask AI to find the moment you emotionally detached and why.
transformation: Clarifies wounds in social trust and reveals attachment themes.

title: Symbolic Death Practice
description: Imaginal rite for letting go of a life phase.
instructions: Describe a self-image or chapter you're leaving behind. Ask AI to write a symbolic death ritual.
transformation: Provides closure and psychological release from past identities.

title: Emotional Lie Detector
description: Tests whether your stated feelings align with subconscious clues.
instructions: Describe a reaction or memory. Ask AI if your words betray suppressed emotional states.
transformation: Improves emotional granularity and narrative honesty.

title: Purpose Scar Extraction
description: Searches for trauma at the root of your life’s mission.
instructions: Describe your purpose. Ask AI to identify what emotional wound your purpose might be a response to.
transformation: Distinguishes between purpose as healing vs. evasion.

title: Silence Mapping Tool
description: Finds the spaces, topics, and truths you avoid.
instructions: List your top avoided conversations. Ask AI what identity risk or fear drives the silence.
transformation: Restores integrity and supports identity expansion.

title: Emotional Anchor Reassignment
description: Redirects emotional dependence to healthier loci.
instructions: Describe a person or object you rely on for emotional regulation. Ask AI to design a system for internal or distributed anchoring.
transformation: Reduces reactivity and builds emotional sovereignty.

title: Mythic Role Clarifier
description: Helps identify the mythic archetype shaping your life arc.
instructions: Describe your major life events. Ask AI to match them to a mythic arc and role you’ve unconsciously assumed.
transformation: Grants narrative orientation and reveals symbolic destiny templates.

title: Hero Complex Deflation
description: Tool to dissolve over-identification with saving others.
instructions: Describe a time you felt compelled to rescue someone. Ask AI to reframe that impulse as projection or control.
transformation: Frees energy trapped in messiah patterns and fosters healthier boundaries.

title: Self-Abandonment Tracker
description: Detects when you emotionally or physically exit your own needs.
instructions: Describe a recent situation where you were uncomfortable. Ask AI where you may have suppressed or bypassed yourself.
transformation: Builds self-loyalty and strengthens internal boundaries.

title: Projection Reversal Mechanism
description: Detects traits you unconsciously assign to others that belong to you.
instructions: List judgments about others. Ask AI which ones might reflect disowned parts of yourself.
transformation: Integrates shadow elements and defuses relational distortion.

title: Wound-Creation Feedback Loop
description: Exposes how you're unknowingly creating the conditions that recreate your trauma.
instructions: Describe a repeated pain. Ask AI how your behavior or environment might be recreating it.
transformation: Interrupts trauma repetition and enables healing shifts.

title: Emotional Displacement Detector
description: Tool to reveal where feelings are leaking onto unrelated targets.
instructions: Describe an emotional outburst. Ask AI to trace the emotion back to its true origin.
transformation: Improves emotional accuracy and prevents unnecessary conflict.

title: Desire Origin Mapper
description: Unpacks the formative event behind your strongest desires.
instructions: Describe a core longing. Ask AI what formative memory may have seeded it.
transformation: Links desire to biography, granting choice and clarity.

title: Psychic Cost Estimator
description: Calculates the hidden emotional toll of performing or suppressing.
instructions: Describe a social context where you mask yourself. Ask AI what the long-term cost is.
transformation: Clarifies identity exhaustion and builds motivation for authentic expression.

title: Emotional Regression Checkpoint
description: Detects when you're reacting from an earlier developmental stage.
instructions: Describe a strong reaction. Ask AI what age or wound it might be echoing.
transformation: Improves emotional maturity and timeline coherence.

title: Fear Source Decomposition
description: Breaks a fear into its layered cognitive and emotional origins.
instructions: Name a fear. Ask AI to split it into bodily, cognitive, social, and symbolic components.
transformation: Increases agency through fear specificity.

title: Symbolic Inversion Therapy
description: Uses symbolic opposites to restructure internal conflict.
instructions: Describe an emotional struggle. Ask AI to design a symbolic action or ritual using its inverse meaning.
transformation: Unlocks transformation through embodied contradiction.
